====================
0.0.3
====================
December 25th, 2025
--------------------

* Added :attr:`dict2rel.UnravelOptions.support_heterogeneous_data` to support fields where sometimes the value
  is an object and other times it is a list of objects. Without this flag, the object is flattened inline and the
  list of objects ends up in a separate table. With this flag, both cases end up in the separate table.

  * Previously

    >>> dict2rel([
    ...     {
    ...         "addresses": {
    ...             "address1": "101 North Street",
    ...             "city": "Waco",
    ...             "state": "Texas",
    ...             "zip": "76711"
    ...         }
    ...     },
    ...     {
    ...         "addresses": [
    ...             {
    ...                 "address1": "500 W 6th St",
    ...                 "city": "Waterloo",
    ...                 "state": "Iowa",
    ...                 "zip": "50701"
    ...             }
    ...         ]
    ...     }
    ... ], ...)
    
    * ``*``

      +--------------------+----------------+-----------------+---------------+-----+
      | addresses.address1 | addresses.city | addresses.state | addresses.zip | _id |
      +====================+================+=================+===============+=====+
      | 101 North Street   | Waco           | Texas           | 76711         | 0   |
      +--------------------+----------------+-----------------+---------------+-----+

    * ``*.addresses``

      +--------------+----------+-------+-------+---------------+
      | address1     | city     | state | zip   | _id           |
      +==============+==========+=======+=======+===============+
      | 500 W 6th St | Waterloo | Iowa  | 50701 | 1.addresses.0 |
      +--------------+----------+-------+-------+---------------+

  * Now with :attr:`UnravelOptions(support_heterogeneous_data=True) <dict2rel.UnravelOptions.support_heterogeneous_data>`

    >>> dict2rel(..., UnravelOptions(support_heterogeneous_data=True))

    * ``addresses``
    
      +------------------+----------+-------+-------+---------------+
      | address1         | city     | state | zip   | _id           |
      +==================+==========+=======+=======+===============+
      | 101 North Street | Waco     | Texas | 76711 | 0.addresses.0 |
      +------------------+----------+-------+-------+---------------+
      | 500 W 6th St     | Waterloo | Iowa  | 50701 | 1.addresses.0 |
      +------------------+----------+-------+-------+---------------+

* Updated handling of fields specified in :attr:`~dict2rel.UnravelOptions.fields_to_expand` so that values which
  were originally objects aren't reconstructed as lists of a single object. Instead, the original object will be
  reconstructed correctly with :func:`~dict2rel.rel2dict`
* Updated :func:`~dict2rel.dict2rel` to only produce rows which have values and tables which have rows
